caption: NTP Activity
description: The Network Time Protocol (NTP) Activity events report instances of remote clients synchronizing their clocks with an NTP server, as observed on the network.
name: ntp_activity

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: Not used in standard NTP implementations.

2.caption: Symmetric Passive Response
2.description: Device responds as a server to peers in symmetric active mode.

4.caption: Server Response
4.description: Dedicated NTP time server, responds to clients.

5.caption: Broadcast
5.description: Broadcast time info to network devices.

7.caption: Private Use Case
7.description: Reserved - Not defined in standard NTP specifications.

version.description: The version number of the NTP protocol.
